data.message: Not related to this post but... I PRAY THAT YOU READ THIS. MY MOTHER DIED IN DECEMBER OF 2013 AND HER FACEBOOK IS STILL ACTIVATED, I WOULD LOVE NOTHING MORE THAT TO HAVE ACCESS TO HER ACCOUNT. I CAN SEND OBITUARY OR WHAT EVER IT IS IF YOU NEED PROOF. PLEASE.

replies.message: We're so sorry for your loss, Amanda. In order to protect the privacy of the deceased person, we cannot provide login information for the account. It is our policy to memorialize the account of a deceased person. However, once it has been memorialized, we take measures to secure the account. If you need to report a Timeline to be memorialized, please contact us here:  http://on.fb.me/1V9ZxXe. -Jordan
